<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5778) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Additive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=795" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 66 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can add a crystalline additive to an [alchemical bomb](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=7) to have it undermine your enemy. Choose [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65), [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=66), [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58), or a –5-foot status penalty to Speeds. If the attack with the bomb hits, in addition to the bomb's normal effects, the target must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or take that effect until the start of your next turn. Use your class DC for this saving throw, even if someone else throws the bomb.

<title level="2">Debilitating Bomb leads to...</title>
[Greater Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5789)
name: Debilitating Bomb
